subject: Re: [junit] Junit capabilities
msgSnippet: ... I would use PMD or checkstyle to enforce coding standards. What other kinds of code review do you think one could automate? -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
messageBody:
raji_renganathan wrote:
>
>
> Can Anyone let me know the capabilities of Junit apart from unit
> testing?
> Can it be customized to be used for Code REviews?

I would use PMD or checkstyle to enforce coding standards. What other
kinds of code review do you think one could automate?
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
